
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is an array of strings.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is an array of strings.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( [ 'abc', 'def' ] )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( [ 'abc', 123 ] )
    false


{{alias}}.primitives( value )
    Tests if a value is an array containing only string primitives.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is an array containing only string
        primitives.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}.primitives( [ 'abc', 'def' ] )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}.primitives( [ 'abc', new String( 'def' ) ] )
    false


{{alias}}.objects( value )
    Tests if a value is an array containing only `String` objects.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is an array containing only `String`
        objects.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}.objects( [ new String( 'ab' ), new String( 'cd' ) ] )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}.objects( [ new String( 'abc' ), 'def' ] )
    false

    See Also
    --------
